thread.title: Malloy Names Pick for Chief Justice of Connecticut Supreme Court

author: Joseph De Avila
title: Malloy Names Pick for Chief Justice of Connecticut Supreme Court
text:
Connecticut Gov. Dannel Malloy on Monday nominated state Supreme Court Justice Andrew McDonald to serve as chief justice for the top court in the state.
If the state Legislature confirms Justice McDonald, he would become Connecticut’s first openly gay chief justice. He would also be the first openly gay chief justice on any state’s highest court, according to the governor’s office. Puerto Rico, a U.S. territory, has an openly gay chief justice.
...
